website_summaries.verdict: Non-GMO, gluten-free herb blend designed to boost fertility and libido.
pros: Helps some women get pregnant, while helps other women balance mood and hormones
cons: Not safe for continued use once you’ve conceived

customer_reviews.title: Take as directed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried for a year to have a baby and nothing worked. When I purchased this item it was out of pure despair. I did the cheapest thing. Well when I started taking them it was with an open mind. I didn't even finish the bottle (one month supply if taken as directed) and now my husband and I are pregnant with twins. I highly recommend this item to anyone who is trying. It does work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynz

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Pills
customer_reviews.text: I took the pills just as instructed and now im expecting after one month of taking pills
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took for a full cycle and boom positive test .
customer_reviews.text: First try ! Took everyday along with bee pollen pills for 29 days out of my 28 day cycle and pregnancy test positive !
customer_reviews.author: Stef D

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure
customer_reviews.text: Giving this 3 stars because I'm not sure about these. I started these 4 months ago, and got pregnant after less than a month taking these. I was ecstatic. A month later I miscarried. I started these again right away to help conceive again, so we waited a full cycle and before trying again. I've taken these daily, been tracking my cycles, and taking prenatals. It's been 2 months, 2 cycles and nothing. Its probably just my body, but I thought I would share my history with these incase someone out there is having the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Consult the doctor first
customer_reviews.text: The product worked the first month I took it ,I am pregnant but I got rashes very bad in all my body I had go to the doctor because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Deyglimarly

customer_reviews.title: ... while on my period I don’t have cramps as bad.
customer_reviews.text: I feel different while on my period I don’t have cramps as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Ann

customer_reviews.title: I think these were a GREAT BUY!! TRY THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Imma go ahead and give it a 5 stars I’m not sure if it has gotten me pregnant yet but my body tends to feel a bit different so maybe finally these MAGICAL PILLS did the job just like so many reviews claimed!! I will update as soon as I get more results!!
customer_reviews.author: Domminic Roland

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been ttc for six months. My obgyn referred me to a fertility specialist on October 15 th but I had started taking these on October 13th. I didn’t really think it would work but I got my bfp on November 3rd. Very pleased with this product. Has no taste and is easy to swallow as well. I also didn’t experience any side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Honey B Royals

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 5 stars i begin taking them on June 13 and on July 6th i got 3 positive pregnancy test !!! I didn’t even finish the whole bottle , Yess I’m so excited i high recommend
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: This works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this for a month and a half....baby on the way!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Got pregnant in 2 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Got pregnant at age 43 within 2mo I’d this supplement support! Unbelievable! Have repurchased!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa333

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had my period for years and im only 28 years the very first day i took this i had it it lasted about 7 day which it used to be normal for me i finished the whole bottle but didn't keep up with it. I definitely will recommend for those with irregular periods. will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn't get pregnant (yet), but there was a definitely boost in my moods!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Forever

customer_reviews.title: They are a great product
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t work the first month bc I started taking them so late but the next month after my cycle I took them and I’m now 8 weeks pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Daniejah C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for 2 months has not work for me sadly. I'm sad that I wasted money on this o well atleast I tried it and now I know it doesn't work every woman is different.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Granquist

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't work for me. They did however make me have a second period.
customer_reviews.author: Dayjanae Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: It worked! After 6month trying, took these for 3 weeks and it worked. One thing that is not clear is "not to use during pregnancy" - which you wouldn't know for some time. So are you supposed to take it just first 2 weeks of your cycle?
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana V.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking it for a month. Hasn’t done anything for me, I can’t even ovulate. I have missed 2 months of my period & thought this may help me start, didn’t do that either. Doesn’t affect my mood or anything. Was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.McDaniels :)

customer_reviews.title: Miracle vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this for 14 days and I got a positive pregnancy test!!! I was super skeptical because I’ve had two abortions in the past and a miscarriage so with implantation issues I’m so surprised this product worked so well so soon!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Started taking these this week! They don’t have a taste and are easy to swallow! Will post another review if we conceive
customer_reviews.author: Breanna1993

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Good but i didn't see no changes i never got my period so I'll give it a 5 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Onlyonly been taking for 3 days so far nothing but hopefully itll work! Will update later!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Still Waiting
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping that in the upcoming months with use, we will become pregnant. No luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Just Received
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package 4 days ago .. Im on day two ; wish me luck 🤞🏾🖤
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: Love how this is easily taken. Easy to swallow and I take it daily
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Delivered earlier then expected
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this product actually works. But it delivered earlier then expected
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Works for My Menopausal Symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40 year old and started noticing symptoms of estrogen loss. In my research I found that fertility herbs were similar to menopausal relief herbs. I wondered if fertility supplements would relieve the symptoms of peri menopause and menopause? I tried a few different blends of fertility and menopausal supplements and found this one most effective. This capsule worked for me personally. What works for me doesn't work for everyone. Do your own research and find what works for you! I am not a doctor. Please talk to your doctor before making health decisions. I am not paid to endorse this product. I bought this on my own to find relief from symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell if its working.
customer_reviews.text: No idea if it's working. Being taking it for 2-3 weeks now and noticed drive has increased, and I've been having cramps but I skipped my period so hoping this is it and worked especially after having 2 chemical miscarriages and 1 other miscarriage.
customer_reviews.author: devantenae Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.text: I've always had problems with one ovary being very inconsistent. I didn't get pregnant by first month using this product but it was the first month my ovary was actually consistent and spot on what I predicted - so I feel like it definitely did something helpful! I'm going to keep taking it and try again this month...fingers crossed!!
customer_reviews.author: Stepbac

customer_reviews.title: I took for 2 months with no luck baby wise ...
customer_reviews.text: I took for 2 months with no luck baby wise - but I did notice that my "drive" seemed to be increased. I will be reordering!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany And Kinnley

customer_reviews.title: No pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I’m 37! This has caused my periods to come sooner then usual and that’s about it
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything for me I’m one month 4& nothing yet
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I feel like they work
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS which has been causing me to not be having my period and not to ovulate and I been through 2 different treatments to try and get them back to normal and I am still going through my 2nd treatment and witb these supplements it seems my hormone levels for ovulation was rising back to normal where as without them they just stayed as low as they have been so I have to strongly say that they work and is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Martin

customer_reviews.title: Eat with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product says take with a meal. It means take with a meal. I took it with out a meal and got very sick. My bad. I only took it a handful of times because it says discontinue use after conception. So I assumed it may not be safe for me being TTC.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Im not finish with my bottle yet but so far nothing has happened.
customer_reviews.author: SHONTI

customer_reviews.title: Giving them a shot !
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping . Both my husband and I received our pills and are hoping for the best .
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: I am not certain if it "works" per se. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not certain if it "works" per se. But my hormones are definitely balancing with one months use and I feel calmer and less PMS symptoms. I believe the added estrogen to my body has improved its function and stabilized some of my thyroid and hormonal imbalances.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Within 3 days of taking these pills my period came back (which is what I was hoping for). Now, it could be a coincidence but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: AzulTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived a couple days early
customer_reviews.text: Came a couple days early, I'm not sure how well it works yet it's only been a week but I'm excited to give it a try. Good luck ladies and baby dust to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Samantha krieger

customer_reviews.title: Made my cycle/ovation longer
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s review. Would give zero stars if I could. This stuff made my cycle longer. I decided to stop taking it after 5 days of not ovulating had passed when I should have. 3 days after stopping i ovulated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars because I did ovulate, which I usually don't. I had all the symptoms of ovulation. I'm still taking them and it's a little early to know if I'm pregnant yet. I will update in a couple of weeks when my period is due.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: I did not get pregnant
customer_reviews.text: I took this and it didn't do anything at all and I didn't get pregnant. My cycles were exactly the same. A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get pregnant so I can’t comment on that but did help with my period
customer_reviews.author: skyla jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know it helps or not. Just starting. Will post it later.
customer_reviews.author: mom2013

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: been taking these for months, and still not pregnant. hoping it happens soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica werkheiser Banks

customer_reviews.title: easy to take and no nasty after taste
customer_reviews.text: No problems, easy to take and no nasty after taste. 30 day supply.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

product_meta.title: Herbtheory Female Fertility Supplement for Women (950mg, 60 Capsules)
feature_bullets: FEMALE FERTILITY supplement for Women, by HERBTHEORY with EPIMEDIUM is crafted using proven herbal recipes. This blend can help to DETOXIFY the organs of THE BODY to REDUCE STRESS while naturally BOOSTING LIBIDO.*

Carefully blended premium NON-GMO herbs to PROMOTE Female Fertility. FEMALE FERTILITY is INTENDED TO address the causes that disrupt the CONCEPTION support process.* Female Fertility is Non-GMO Project Verified, Vegan, and Gluten-Free. EPIMEDIUM (Horny Goat Weed) : Hollywood Sex therapists are also recommending celebrities to take Horny Goat Weed in pill form, if they dramatically and safely want to increase their chances of conceiving.

REHMANNIA is a wonderful herb for supporting the vitality of female fertility. It is used to maintain and/or regulate the menstrual cycle, and reduce inflammation and uterine spasm. CHINESE PEONY has been used for painful menstruation and PCOS. It contains the chemical compound paeoniflorin, which has been shown to decrease testosterone production.

ASIATIC DOGWOOD may increase fertility in infertile women. It may lower levels of FSH and increase estradiol levels. CHINESE YAM may enable diosgenin to act on estrogen receptor sites in the hypothalamus, which in turn may help to regulate production of estrogen, aiding in estrogen balance.

PORIA to reduce water retention and edema associated with menstruation. ASTRAGALUS helps to decrease stress and tension which can affect fertility and regulates normal cell growth. CONDONOPSIS is one of several fertility herbs classified as an adrenal tonic and adaptogen, anti-anxiety, anti-inflammatory and overall tonic for vitality, energy and overall well-being.
